record.title: HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW AND ADJOURNMENT FROM FRIDAY, JUNE 8, 2007, TO MONDAY, JUNE 11, 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 4 p.m. tomorrow, and, further, when the House adjourns on that day, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Monday, June 11, for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
